videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: How is this deck still legal in Standard?
videos.description:
Dino Reanimator is one of the turn-three combo decks that remain in Standard, and it might be ever better after the bans.

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/L1a1_tQ9zEeBLcgLJD9xYg

videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: I played the most toxic Omniscience deck before it got banned
videos.description:
I played Omniscience again, and then the deck got banned, and now I can't release this footage of me being toxic on ladder. So this is for the Mesa Falcon Gang Members only, enjoy!
